dmca.title: Travel Website Requests Removal of Mirroring Site (#3)
dmca.body:
25/11/2004 14:13   XXXXXXXXXXX    KASBAHDOTCOMTD    PAGE 02/05 

www.kasbah.com 
[private]
[private]
Lancashire
FY8 1PS
England

TEL +XX (X) XXXX XXXXXX 
FAX +XX (X) XXXX XXXXXX
company no. 04351240 
vat no. 823 349922 

Google,lnc. 
Attn:Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private] 
CA 94043 

25th November 2004 

Dear Sir/Madam 

It has come to our attention that the domain www.go4.it is displaying a copy of our Travel guides and travel toolbox. Though we have very recently changed the look and feel of our Site the content is the same and they are duplicating it. We have made an effort to contact the owner who states that they purchased the content but can produce no evidence of purchase. We are confident that no evidence can be produced, as we do not sell our content. We have asked them on numerous occasions to remove the content to no avail. We are now perusing them through the English courts. Our fears (although the content has been on their site for more than nine months) are that google has changed its algorithms to tighten up on duplicate content that their copied content will have a more negative affect on our site. 

The list of offending pages is extensive and can be e-mailed if you wish 

We have a good faith belief that the copyright owner, its agent, or the law does not authorize use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

A speedy response would be appreciated 1 am sure you can understand our reason for distress. 

[private] (Director) E-mail [private]@kasbah.com 

25/11/2004 14:13    XXXXXXXXXXX    KASBAHDOTCOMTD    PAGE 03/05 

www.go4it.co.uk - Offending pages    go4it
